text: Manila International Airport (shortly known as MIA) and commonly known named by Ninoy Aquino International Airport, is an international airport for Manila and its surrounding metropolitan area. It is located along the border between the cities of Pasay and Para√±aque, about south of Manila proper and southwest of Makati. == Terminals == * Terminal 1 - All International * Terminal 2 - International & Domestic * Terminal 3 - Domestic & International * Terminal 4 - Domestic == References == Category:Airports in the Philippines Category:20th-century establishments in the Philippines Category:1948 establishments in Asia
title: Manila International Airport
